amendment.description: Page 157, after line 2, add the following new section: SEC. 10002. None of the funds made available by this Act may be used to propose, plan for, or execute an additional Base Realignment and Closure round.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Wittman amendment (A036) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Wittman amendment (A036) Failed by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A036) offered by Mr. Wittman.
